definitions.title: crouch
definitions.body: (NH id.; TelAm. šaḫâhu (Wkl:TelAm. Vocab.), prostrate oneself, prob. Canaanism; As. šaḫâḫu is oppress, torment);—
be bowed down, prostrated, humbled, by ´[[י]]:, Is 2:11, Is 2:17 (both ‖[[שׇׁפֵל ]]), Hb Hab 3:6 (of hills), Job 9:13 (´[[תַּחְתָּו שׁ]]:), Ps 107:39 (+ [[מָעַט]]); by man Ps 10:10.
bow in homage, [[לִפְנֵי]] pers. Pr 14:19; [[וְהָֽלְבוּ אֵלַיִח שְׁחוֹחַ]] Is 60:14 (‖[[הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ ]]).
crouch, of wild beast in lair Job 38:40.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. be prostrated, humbled: [[êוַיִּשַּׁח אָדָם]] Is 2:9 (‖[[שָׁפֵל ]]) = Is 5:15 (‖ id.); be reduced, weakened, [[יִשַּׁ֫חוּ כָּל־בְּנוֹת הַשִּׁיר]] Ec 12:4; = proceed humbly, of words [[מֵעָפָר]] Is 29:4 (‖[[שָׁפֵל ]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: prostrate, lay low, city, walls, etc.; Pf. 3 ms. [[הֵךְַ]] Is 25:12, Is 26:5 (both ‖[[הִשְׁפִּיל ]]).

definitions.title: Hithpō‘
definitions.body: be cast down, despairing: Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּשְׁתּוֹחָָח]] Ps 42:7, 2 fs. [[תִּשְׁתּוֹחֲחִי]] v:Ps 42:6, v:Ps 42:11, Ps 43:5 (all c. subj. [[נַפְשִׁי]]).
